The reason why everyone thinks the bermuda trianangle is more dangerous is: Everyone looks at the number of things disappear, not the percentage. If 100 planes fly through an area and one of the crashes, the percentage is 1% and the number is 1 plane. But if 10'000 planes fly through there, and the percentage stays at 1% there will be 100 planes crashing.
And in the bermuda triangle there simply are many ships and planes as well as helicopters used. And therefore many also get missing, but the percentage is just normal.
